TopicTitle: Canberra Stock Campaign series (working towards a turn of events)

Articles.Content:
Hello, hello, hello. I'm starting a new KSP series. Kind of a change for me. I've never played Career before. I'm giving it a shot but I'd also like to finish the series off with a never before done (I think) twist! Please stay tuned and critique me. I'd appreciate brutal honesty.

Subscriptions are a bit nice if you liked it. I'm just starting out again.

Edited April 28, 2016 by Canberra_Gaming
So episode two is recorded after a mini heart attack when my game crashed
Oh so this is what you were doing.
Well thanks to KSPs unstability my persist broke after I was almost done with Episode 2. This is why I can't have nice things... I'll let this be the death of this series.
